name: A sparkling bronze crown
data: It decreases the users strength slightly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
